home.title: I'm Vincent Jeannin
home.subtitle: Software engineer, student in the HES-SO MSE Master's programme. Based in Switzerland
home.download: Download my CV in PDF format

about.title: About me
about.first_paragraph: I've been fascinated by computers and programming since I was 13, and started learning JavaScript on my own. Then, when I was at secondary school, I chose the complementary option of Computer Science, and from that moment on it never left me.
about.second_paragraph: After that, I started developing bots on the Discord platform, in order to improve myself, but above all to have fun. My services were recognized by some members of the community, and I've never stopped making them.
about.third_paragraph: Apart from IT, I really enjoy music. I've been playing the piano since 2016, and I'm a big motorbike enthusiast, as well as sport in general. I swam competitively for 8 years and I regularly boulder climb.

uditis_2020.name: UDITIS SA
uditis_2020.intro: During the first part of 2020, I spent 5 months doing an internship at UDITIS SA, based in Peseux in the canton of Neuchâtel.
uditis_2020.description: One of my tasks was to create a desktop application that would allow different test scenarios to be created for one of their projects, the "carnets ATA".

uditis_2021.name: UDITIS SA
uditis_2021.intro: During the summer holidays in 2021, for a period of 6 weeks, I did a work placement at UDITIS SA, located in Peseux, in the canton of Neuchâtel.
uditis_2021.description: My job was to resume the development begun in 2020, and to improve it.
